title: Jardiniere, ca. 1890
dimensions:
H x diam. (a,b together): 79.5 x 38 cm (31 5/16 x 14 15/16 in.)
H x diam. (a, base): 55 x 27.5 cm (21 5/8 x 10 13/16 in.)
H x diam. (b, bowl): 24.5 x 38 cm (9 5/8 x 14 15/16 in.)
description: Columnar base (a) of glazed mottled blue and gray with stems of blue and white iris on cold-painted red ground, on domed circular foot; bowl-shaped top, glazed like base. Circular bowl (b), with five bunches of iris on cold-painted red ground; flaring wavy rim with thick, running mottled glaze.  Fake Japanese mark on bottom side. Carved wooden stand (c).
